title: Kerokero Keroppi no Kero Kero House no Himitsu

synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
Keroppi and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
alternative_titles.en: Keroppi in the Frog's Secret House
alternative_titles.ja: けろけろけろっぴのけろけろハウスのひみつ

synopsis: On a rainy day Keroppi and friends find their elders' old secret club house. But the house ends up being more magical than they thought.
